end else begin
    err <= {EVENT_WIDTH{1'b0}};
  end
end

always @(posedge clk) begin
  if (reset == 1'b1) begin
    status_err_cnt <= 'h0;
  end else if (~&status_err_cnt[CNT_WIDTH-1:EVENT_WIDTH_LOG]) begin
    status_err_cnt <= status_err_cnt + num_set_bits(err);
  end
end

endmodule
